item.title: Boxuan, Claudio Eugenio & Suprabhath presenting
item.description:
We are at the Scientific Days of the Coordinated Action “Modelling of Infectious Diseases” of ANRS-MIE.

This year we are at EHESP in Rennes.

item.title: Suprabhath Kalahasti
item.description: Suprabhath is a PhD student in Public Health at Sorbonne Universit√© and the Pierre Louis Institute of Epidemiology and Public Health (IPLESP). His research is focused on improving the knowledge and predictability of seasonal epidemic waves of airborne, directly transmitted pathogens by developing mathematical models using AI/ML techniques to inform public health decision making.

item.title: EV / The Modelers now on the Italian ILI Forecast platform Influcast
item.description:
Influcast is platform to forecast the evolution of the incidence of influenza-like-illness in Italy by integrating prediction from multiple teams and models. It is coordinated by the ISI Foundation. EV / The Modelers now provides weekly estimates to Influcast.

Through our collaboration with Influcast, our goal is to push the methodological boundaries of mathematical models. Partnering up with our colleagues at the computer science dept. of the University of Bologna, Italy, we are developing a model that combines mechanistic mathematical modeling of epidemic dynamics with deep-learning based inference from data, using physics-informed neural networks.

The interaction with Influcast allows us to assess and improve the performance of our models in a nowcasting scenario and to benchmark them against existing forecasting frameworks.

item.title: Welcome Suprabhath!
item.description: Suprabhath starts his PhD in Epidemiology and public health at our group.
